title: Семья Светофоровых
overview: «Sem'ya Svetoforovykh» is the first family educational series about traffic rules.A large and friendly Svetoforov family lives in a very ordinary house in Moscow. Dad is a strong and brave traffic police captain, mom is a cheerful but strict pastry chef, Artem is a fifteen-year-old handsome man, Liza is a thirteen-year-old fashionista, Semyon Semyonich is a very important five-year-old guy who knows exactly what he wants in this life. And the family also has a grandmother and grandfather. Grandmother works as a tour guide at the State Traffic Inspectorate Museum, and Grandfather is a traffic police colonel. Together with his grandson Semyon Semyonich, he is engaged in a very important matter - he runs a video blog on the Internet, in which he tells children and adults such important and such necessary Traffic Rules.The Svetoforov family is constantly experiencing all sorts of stories. They are both funny and instructive at the same time. This family is very similar to yours. You will definitely recognize yourself and your friends in these characters!
